name: Shell Kingdom
description:
Turtles unite! The armadillos have taken your island. Command a squad of loyal turtles to storm the beaches, infiltrate the fortress, and free your brothers and sisters from the dark, dank dungeons of the castle. Together we can win, because many turtles  make for a stronger shell.

Turt le revolution!

Controls:
Use the arrow keys to move your turtles.

Credits:
Jeffrey Fillingham (@pmo_fillingham)
Alex Choiniere (@choinheap)
Ian Johnston (@landsharkRAWR)
Thank you Conor Grail for providing the audio.

Music from https://rpgmaker.net/musicpack/ (tracks used: Valiant, Desert Crossing, Mellow Darkness, and Puzzles)

Be the REVOLUTION you want. Re-take your island. Take back what is rightfully yours!

May 2018
Made for Fax Jam 2018
